a.xlink:title:
Catalyst
Decentralized Servers

g.title: cluster_cli
g.text: Command line to start new projects,

a.xlink:title:
Kernel

Code package to bind all low level constructs
of Decentraland to generate an
usable Explorer Arrows are omitted for clarity.
Assume everything is connected to Sagas.
a.text: Code package to bind all low level constructs
usable Explorer Arrows are omitted for clarity.
Assume everything is connected to Sagas.

a.xlink:title:
BFF
P2P Signaling and
Client entry point

NATS
Message Broker

Lambdas
Utilities to retrieve and validate data
a.text: Utilities to retrieve and validate data

a.xlink:title:
Catalyst Client
Library to interact with Catalyst Servers
a.text: Library to interact with Catalyst Servers

a.xlink:title:
Archipelago
Groups peers in islands

Content Server
Assets Storage

LiveKit
High Quality Media Server

The Graph
Query the Blockchain

CLI

Compiles scenes (build-ecs)
Preview scenes in browser
Uploads compiled code to catalys

Scene Runtime
Handles SDK bindings
and messaging with the Scene in Kernel
a.text: and messaging with the Scene in Kernel

a.xlink:title:
Renderer
Different implementations of renderers are available
to debug in Unity Editor
a.text: Different implementations of renderers are available

a.xlink:title:
build-ecs
Bundles code from senes, AMD and ECS
to generate deployable scenes
a.text: Bundles code from senes, AMD and ECS

a.xlink:title:
ECS
The public library to interact with Decentraland.
Sometimes people refers to the ECS as “The SDK”
a.text: The public library to interact with Decentraland.
Sometimes people refers to the ECS as “The SDK”

a.xlink:title:
Synapse Matrix Server
Decentralized Service to manages
private chats and Friendships

Matrix Client
Abstraction over the Matrix protocol to
enable Friends list and private chats
a.text: Abstraction over the Matrix protocol to
enable Friends list and private chats

g.title: Sagas
g.text: Like an ESB: Everything is connected to sagas

a.xlink:title:
AMD
Manages loading of RPC modules to interact
with different components of Decentraland
a.text: Manages loading of RPC modules to interact

g.title: UserCode
g.text: User generated code is part of the bundle

a.xlink:title:
Explorer Website

React App to load kernel and renderer
a.text: React App to load kernel and renderer

a.xlink:title:
Client Comms

Abstraction over the communications protocols

Voice Chat Module
Set of components to hook
WebAudio and Worklets to comms

Scene Loader System
High level wrapper around a runtime scene
a.text: High level wrapper around a runtime scene

a.xlink:title:
Scene
Loads and Unloads scenes around the User
a.text: Loads and Unloads scenes around the User

a.xlink:title:
Avatar Scene
It is a regular Decentraland Scene,.
it has the size of the world.
And it renders the avatars using the SDK
a.text: It is a regular Decentraland Scene,.
it has the size of the world.
And it renders the avatars using the SDK

a.xlink:title:
Peer Library
Comms Library
